scope: Items 60-95 roadmap with phased control alignment (Cost, Change, Security, Trust)

risk_burndown.method: risk points per item (0-5) tracked weekly until <=1

completion_policy.drift_avoidance: Completed or descoped items are frozen from edits except evidence URLs

phases.name: Cost
phases.goal: Keep delivery within budget and quota envelopes while enabling guardrails for experimentation.

phases.name: Change
phases.goal: Standardize change risk, progressive delivery, and rollback readiness.

phases.name: Security
phases.goal: Enforce preventative and detective controls (WAF, rate limits, SBOM, zero-trust).

phases.name: Trust
phases.goal: Guarantee reliability, fairness, and operator confidence through evidence and communication.

ci_cd_integration.policy_as_code: CI/CD gates are expressed as policy-as-code (OPA/Rego) with evidence archived per release.
ci_cd_integration.budget_gates: FinOps budget and quota validation executed pre-merge; block if projected monthly run-rate exceeds limit or quotas are missing.
ci_cd_integration.rate_limit_and_waf: Security job validates WAF policy manifests and API rate-limit settings per service before deploy.
ci_cd_integration.canary_policy: Deployments require canary release steps with automated metrics + log verification and auto-rollback criteria.
ci_cd_integration.rollback_drills: Change phase requires scheduled rollback simulations; CI asserts runbook links and last-run timestamp.

items.name: FinOps budget guardrails
acceptance_tests: Budget thresholds configured per environment with pass/fail CI gate
Cost anomaly alert fires in staging when synthetic overage is injected

checkpoints.exit: Budget envelopes defined; CI config stub committed
Budget gate running in CI with sample evidence

ci_cd_gates.budget: blocks if projected monthly run-rate exceeds envelope
ci_cd_gates.quota: requires quota contract file per service
ci_cd_gates.canary: cost metrics sampled during canary stage

items.name: Service quota contracts
acceptance_tests: Quota manifest exists for every critical service
CI fails if manifest missing or limits exceed platform policy

ci_cd_gates.rollback: reverts to prior manifest on failure

items.name: Cost anomaly detection
acceptance_tests: Synthetic spike triggers alert and blocks deployment
Dashboard shows 7-day anomaly history with RCA notes

ci_cd_gates.budget: uses anomaly scores to allow/deny deploy
ci_cd_gates.canary: anomaly detector runs on canary metrics

items.name: Compute right-sizing
acceptance_tests: Autoscaling policies align to target utilization bands
CI enforces resource requests/limits per workload

items.name: Storage lifecycle and TTLs
acceptance_tests: TTL policies defined for logs, artifacts, and datasets
Expired objects automatically purged with audit evidence

ci_cd_gates.quota: storage quota validated against TTL plan

items.name: Pre-production cost sandbox
acceptance_tests: Sandbox environment caps spend with automated shutdown
CI requires sandbox proof before enabling new services

ci_cd_gates.canary: new services must pass sandbox canary

items.name: WAF cost-aware rate limits
acceptance_tests: Rate-limit tiers mapped to cost model and enforced
WAF rules deployed with canary and rollback hooks

ci_cd_gates.rollback: automatic rollback if latency regression detected

items.name: Canary budget coverage
acceptance_tests: Canary runs include budget/latency metrics with thresholds
Rollback triggers on budget overrun during canary

ci_cd_gates.canary: budget metrics evaluated in canary stage

items.name: Cost rollback readiness
acceptance_tests: Rollback runbook links referenced in CI
Rollback tested quarterly with evidence artifacts

ci_cd_gates.budget: reverts to prior config if budgets regress

items.name: Change request automation
acceptance_tests: Change requests generated from PR metadata
CI blocks merges without approved change record

items.name: Progressive delivery rings
acceptance_tests: Ring-based rollout config per service
Automated promotion when metrics stay within SLOs

ci_cd_gates.rollback: auto rollback to previous ring on breach

items.name: Release calendar and freeze controls
acceptance_tests: Release windows encoded and enforced in CI
Freeze windows block deploys and notify owners

items.name: Change impact scoring
acceptance_tests: Impact score calculated from diff size, services, risk inputs
High-risk changes require additional approvals

items.name: Post-change validation
acceptance_tests: Smoke + regression suite executed post-deploy
Results stored with change record and used for rollback decision

ci_cd_gates.canary: validation job tied to canary window

items.name: SLO regression gating
acceptance_tests: SLOs mapped to services with thresholds
CI blocks releases breaching error budget

items.name: Incident rollback drills
acceptance_tests: Quarterly rollback drill logged with metrics
Time-to-restore under target threshold

ci_cd_gates.rollback: blocks deploy if last drill stale

items.name: Feature flag hygiene
acceptance_tests: Flag TTL and owners recorded
CI fails for expired or ownerless flags

items.name: Dependency upgrade cadence
acceptance_tests: Monthly upgrade window enforced
Canary + rollback scripted for major bumps

items.name: Standardized WAF policies
acceptance_tests: WAF ruleset templated and versioned
CI blocks deploys missing WAF attachment

ci_cd_gates.rollback: revert to previous rules on failure

items.name: API rate limit enforcement
acceptance_tests: Per-endpoint rate limits defined and tested
Abuse simulation triggers throttle and logs

ci_cd_gates.rollback: revert limits if latency impact detected

items.name: Secrets rotation automation
acceptance_tests: Secrets rotated automatically with audit trail
CI rejects secrets older than rotation window

ci_cd_gates.rollback: rollback to prior secret set if failure

items.name: SBOM and supply chain scanning
acceptance_tests: SBOM generated per build artifact
CI fails on critical vulnerabilities or unsigned artifacts

items.name: Zero-trust service auth
acceptance_tests: mTLS or token-based auth enforced between services
Unauthorized call attempts denied and logged

ci_cd_gates.rollback: fallback to prior trust domain if failure

items.name: Data egress controls
acceptance_tests: Egress allowlists defined per environment
CI blocks changes that widen egress without approval

items.name: Vulnerability patch SLAs
acceptance_tests: Critical CVEs patched within SLA and evidenced
CI fails if SLA overdue items exist

ci_cd_gates.rollback: rollback to last patched image if violation

items.name: Penetration test backlog
acceptance_tests: Backlog prioritized with owners and dates
Findings tracked to closure with CI evidence

ci_cd_gates.rollback: block release if critical finding unresolved

items.name: Audit logging completeness
acceptance_tests: All privileged actions emit structured audit logs
Tamper checks and retention policy validated in CI

items.name: Data quality SLAs
acceptance_tests: SLA metrics defined for completeness, accuracy, freshness
CI fails ingestion changes lacking SLA tests

items.name: Model evaluation canaries
acceptance_tests: Model changes run canary evaluation with holdout set
Automatic rollback if quality drops beyond threshold

items.name: Bias and fairness checkpoints
acceptance_tests: Bias metrics computed per release
CI blocks deploy when fairness thresholds violated

items.name: Observability dashboards
acceptance_tests: Dashboards for availability, latency, error budget, cost
Alerts linked to dashboards and runbooks

items.name: Risk burndown tracking
acceptance_tests: Weekly risk burndown graph generated
CI verifies latest report exists before release

items.name: User trust communications
acceptance_tests: Release notes include control posture and known risks
CI blocks release without comms artifact

items.name: Disaster recovery and resilience tests
acceptance_tests: Quarterly DR tests executed with RTO/RPO evidence
CI blocks releases if last DR test older than 90 days

ci_cd_gates.rollback: invoke DR rollback if drill fails

items.name: Access review automation
acceptance_tests: Quarterly access reviews automated with approvals logged
CI blocks deploy if stale access detected

items.name: Control validation evidence
acceptance_tests: Evidence bundle generated per release with control results
CI uploads evidence and blocks if missing
